name: Altra_Blackburn_Storage_Bookcase
reviews: A little time consuming to put together, but good directions, so patience is a must.....as well as a power drill. Very pleased with the final results, considering the price I paid.

This is not for the novice builder! The directions are not easy to understand, way too many pieces and not enough screws. That's right, have extra screws around because the manufacturer did not include enough! For the price, it is okay.. however, do not expect high quality materials..not to be used for heavy books or decorative items. Will serve our purpose as a place for 'just stuff' that is laying around and needed a drawer or shelf.. Drawers are a bit small (not too deep) Overall, it is okay.. however, do not expect a great piece of furniture.. and be prepared to put some HOURS into putting it all together. Good Luck!
Cheaply made, but it does the trick to store books and other items. There were no holes for the particle board in the back either, which made putting it together quite difficult.

I love this piece of furniture and it matches nicely. I would HIGHLY suggest checking the manufacturer's website for updated installation instructions. A couple of the main illustrations were incorrect. But, this is one of my favorite pieces in my house!

Altra Blackburn Storage Bookcase is the worst piece of furniture I have ever purchase. First of all, it has more than 23 components, which would be fun to assemble if the item has a reasonable design and quality, however, it DOES NOT. I followed the instruction, but the screws used to join two components aren't long enough(or the wood is too soft) to hold, one can easily detach assemble components with hand. This has made the whole thing completely useless. What's more, Overstock.com charges >$$ for you to return the item, which is more than 1/3 of the price. The item also comes with a shabby packing, which made the return even harder. It's a huge waste of time and money. I'd give 0 star if possible.
Loved it and perfect for my space
It is exactly what I needed and expecting. It is sturdy and sleek. Perfect for her hide-a-way loft bedroom. I recommend this item
description:
Keep your favorite reading materials close at hand within this
Blackburn storage bookcase from Altra. The sleek black construction
melds with modern interior design themes, and the multicolored
wood-grain finishes on the door and drawer fronts give the piece
casual elegance.Features two (2) open storage spaces for display of
  knicknacks or booksHas three storage drawers for items of non-standard
  sizesAdjustable shelf behind cabinet door offers customized
  concealed storageBlack finish and multicolored grey drawer and door fronts
  complement modern furnishingsMatches Altra's other Blackburn collection pieces, sold
  separately, for a cohesive lookAssembles easily for quick setupMade from MDF, paper and particleboardWeights 83.6 poundsOverall dimensions: 57.09 inches high x 30 inches wide x
  12.99 inches deepShelf dimensions: 12 inches high x 29 inches wide x 11.5
  inches deepDrawer interior dimensions: 8.5 inches high x 13 inches wide
  x 9 inches deepDoor dimensions: 28 inches high x 14 inches wideStyleContemporaryMaterialMDF, MetalFinishBlack FinishShelf TypeBookshelves, Display, Media CabinetsAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGrey, TaupeNumber of Shelf3
